! muxt generate --use-receiver-type=NonExistentType

stderr 'could not find receiver type'

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET / Method()"}}Hello{{end}}
